name: ror-refactor
description: A set of refactoring tools for Ruby On Rails

serviceType.title: Service extract template
serviceType.description: Select the template to be used when you refactor some methodes as a new service.

servicePath.title: Services path
servicePath.description: Fill in with the path within your Rails project where the servies should be saved. Let it empty in order to use the default path (PORO: app/services/, Interactor: app/interactors/)

serviceAdditionnalModule.title: Service additionnal module
serviceAdditionnalModule.description: Fill in with the name of a module that your services should always include. Keep it empty in order to not import any module (For the Interactor service, the `Interactor` module is always included)
